title: 1BR/1BA PET-FRIENDLY APARTMENT WITH GRANITE COUNTERS
posting_body: Every day extraordinary—Mansion Grove is a stately luxury retreat in Santa Clara.
502 Mansion Park Dr Santa Clara, CA 95054
Enjoy luxury living at its best when you lease this spacious one-bedroom, one-bathroom residence at Mansion Grove.
The gourmet kitchen has stainless steel appliances to help in preparing meals.
The roomy floor plan can be customized as you see fit, and sizable storage options, including an outdoor closet, help you take care of home organization.
A GE washer and electric dryer provide quick assistance with laundry chores.
After a day at work or when you just want to relax, you’ll appreciate the extra lounging locale provided by a private deck.
Select apartments also have Kashmir white counters and Daltile floors.
Check out the neighborhood amenities, which include lighted tennis courts, full-size basketball courts, and a business center.
Moreover, the neighborhood offers free fitness classes and dry-cleaning services.
Mansion Grove has easy access to Highways 101 and 880, and beautiful Rivermark Shopping Center is nearby.
Pricing and availability: subject to change.
